about_the_game:
I never really wanted to sell He Fucked The Girl Out of Me, but I need money kind of badly. Unfortunately creating new games takes time. The wallpaper packs were kind of a stopgap so that I could afford to keep making that next game.

This is a bonus package meant primarily for people who want to donate something so that I can offer something neat in return for their donations.

This bonus pack contains an artbook, playable early versions of HFTGOOM, interviews, bonus games, and other surprises!



Within the artbook you’ll be able to read through three different parts:

Part 1: A fictional story that I wrote as a vent piece around the time of the game's story.

Part 2: Concept Art, Beta versions of HFTGOOM, and a series of comparisons between the game’s locations and the actual real world locations that they’re based on.

Part 3: Post-release artwork, interviews, and the previously print exclusive Indiepocalypse Artbook that came with physical cartridges of HFTGOOM.

Bonus Games

Saving You From Yourself - Part 1+2 :


Play as a therapist who makes major decisions about a young trans woman’s life for her. See the impact those decisions have on her. In Saving You From Yourself - Part 2, see what happens to Arle after the end of Saving You From Yourself, available for the first time on Steam.

Do I Pass?:


Have you ever wondered about what other people think of you?

In Do I Pass?, Ash gets to learn the answer to this question after she discovers a website of magical spells including one that lets her leave her body and see what people REALLY think of her.

Minimum:

short_description: Bonus Pack containing artbooks, playable early versions of HFTGOOM, interviews, bonus games, and other surprises!Do I Pass? and Saving You From Yourself - Part 1&2 are included in this pack, making this the most complete collection of Taylor McCue’s games currently on steam.
